name: Hover Raider (Original Version)
overview: This Shoot-em Up Construction Kit game was originally released in 1989 but would see a reworking of the game in 2016 as a Redux version, but this is the original release, a vertically scrolling shooter where you control a large hovercraft as it speeds through a swamp terrain and blasts everything to bits with its cannons. Like if River Raid got an armaments upgrade.
